attributes.action: Revoke the fines on rule breaking and introduce a 30 day custodial sentence
attributes.additional_details: Because it is the only measure that will have enough strength to scare the offending people. No one wants a custodial sentence and the thought of prison could prevent it more than fines
attributes.background: 30 day custodial sentence upon first offense on COVID rule breaking. Some people have the money to pay fines. But money can’t buy a get out of jail free card. Custodial sentence will repel everyone from risking the lives of elderly people and the vulnerable adults!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/314400
